name: Tabbed Glass 2
description: An updated version of the original with added support for Dom inspector and should work for most Add-ons options windows.
additional_info:
Update - 2.6
  Updated for firefox 36
Update - 2.5.1
  Fixed glass on some windows
Update - 2.5
  Improved image viewing style
Update - 2.4
  Cleaned up some stuff
  Better styling with tabs on top
  Vertical Toolbar looks nicer
Update - 2.3
  Simplified changes to the main window
Update - 2.2.1
  Adjustment for changes in FF25
  *Removed white background when directly viewing images that have transparencies

Update - 2.2
  Added support for the javascript scratch pad

Update - 2.1
  Changed -moz-border-radius property to border-radius for FF13

Update - 2.3
  Various improvements and polishing
  Cleaned up redundant css
  Redone Downthemall styling

Update - 2.3.1
  Fixed odd line with tabs on top

Update - 2.3.2
  Fixed toolbars not accessible from fullscreen
